name: Mushroom Bok Choy Soup
author: Christopher
summary: I thought of this healthy and delicious recipe when my wife was sick and craving a nice flavorful brothy soup to help make her feel better. It really did the trick! She's asked me to make it several times since then.
ingredients: 1 pound white and crimini mushrooms, cut into quarters
2 tablespoons minced garlic, or more to taste
directions: Heat butter in a stock pot over medium heat; add bok choy, mushrooms, green onions, garlic, and ginger
Sprinkle mushroom mixture with lime juice; cook and stir just until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes
Increase heat to medium-high, pour in chicken broth, and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to low and simmer until vegetables are soft, about 5 minutes
